drinks.name: mojito
drinks.recipe: Stir together lime juice and sugar until sugar dissolves. Add 1/4 cup crushed ice. Rub mint leaves over rim of glass, then tear leaves in half and add to glass. Gently stir for 15 seconds, then add rum, remaining crushed ice, and club soda. Gently stir for 5 seconds.

drinks.name: daiquiri
drinks.recipe: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker. Shake vigorously, then strain into glass.

drinks.name: Jonn the Beachcomber
drinks.recipe: Shake ingredients vigorously with ice. Pour over more ice in festive glassware. Garnish with straws, fruit, umbrellas, cocktail toothpicks.

drinks.name: Rosita
drinks.recipe: Stir over ice, and strain into an old fashioned glass. Wipe the rim of the glass with lemon or grapefruit twist.

drinks.name: Finger-Stirred Negroni
drinks.recipe: Pour ingredients over ice into a cocktail shaker. Stir (with your finger) and strain into a rocks glass with ice. Garnish with an orange twist.

drinks.name: Basil Gimlet
drinks.recipe: Add ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake, then strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a basil leaf.

drinks.name: The Salty Bird
drinks.recipe: Combine all ingredients, then shake and strain into a rocks glass over fresh ice. Garnish with a pinch of salt and dehydrated pineapple.

drinks.name: The Parrot's Grog
drinks.recipe: Combine all ingredients, then shake and strain into a rocks glass over fresh ice. Top with club soda, and serve with an umbrella/paper straw.

drinks.name: The Black Vlad
drinks.recipe: Combine in a cocktail shaker and stir. Strain into a highball glass over crushed ice. Garnish with mint or rosemary. *A moonshine alternative works too.

drinks.name: Sour-Cherry Gin Smash
drinks.recipe: In a cocktail shaker, combine the cherries and the sugar cube. Muddle until the sugar is broken down. Add the lime juice and gin, and then shake. Strain into a Collins glass filled with ice. Top with a splash of ginger ale and garnish with a lime wedge.

drinks.name: The Malacca Flip
drinks.recipe: Muddle mint and fresh lemon wedge, then add all other liquid ingredients. Dry shake. Add ice, hard shake. Rinse a cocktail martini coupe with orange bitters. Double strain into the cocktail martini coupe. Garnish with mint leaf.

drinks.name: The Sicilian Firing Squad
drinks.recipe: Combine ingredients into a cocktail shaker. Shake and strain over fresh ice in a rocks glass. Garnish with a lime wheel and a Luxardo cherry.

drinks.name: The Paloma Picante
drinks.recipe: Muddle the grapefruit cubes in a highball glass. Add the rest of the ingredients and crushed ice, and then top with a splash of grapefruit soda.

drinks.name: The Close Shave
drinks.recipe: Combine the vodka and elderflower into a cocktail shaker, shake, and then strain into a chilled martini glass. Top it with a splash of Prosecco and garnish with fresh rosemary.

drinks.name: The Raspberry Gin Rickey
drinks.recipe: Muddle two raspberries in the bottom of a highball glass. Add the rest of the ingredients together with ice. Garnish with a lime slice and more raspberries.

drinks.name: The Sidecar
drinks.recipe: Coat the rim of a cocktail glass with sugar. Add the rest of the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice and stir. Strain into the cocktail glass and garnish with an orange peel.

drinks.name: Strawberry Basil Bourbon Lemonade
drinks.recipe: Place strawberries into blender and add 2 tbsp of sugar. Add about 1/4 of a cup of water and pulse until pureed. In a medium saucepan over a medium-high heat, add the puree and 1 3/4 cup of water. Heat until mixture begins to boil. Allow to cool and then strain through a sieve. In a large pitcher, combine the strawberry syrup, bourbon, 1 cup of water, lemon juice, basil leaves, and a splash of bitters. Stir and then pour into eight glasses with ice. Garnish each with a basil sprig.

drinks.name: Irish hot whiskey
drinks.recipe: Add everything but the water into a mug. Pour hot water over the top, stir.

drinks.name: mulled wine
drinks.recipe: With a mortar and pestle grind the berries and peppercorns and add to a sauce pan. Add all other ingredients to the sauce pan and bring to a boil over medium heat. Remove from heat and let stand for 1 minute. Strain and serve. If not hot enough, bring back to a simmer. Serve hot.

drinks.name: Hot Toddy
drinks.recipe: Add lemon juice, honey, and bourbon to a mug and fill with hot water. Stir to blend and dissolve honey. Add a cinnamon stick and lemon slice studded with cloves for extra aromatics.

drinks.name: Cinnamon Tequila Hot Toddy
drinks.recipe: *Cinnamon Bark Syrup: Combine equal parts sugar and water and 3 cinnamon sticks in a saucepan and bring to a boil to create cinnamon bark syrup. Remove cinnamon sticks. Combine the remainder of the ingredients in a coffee glass. Stir and garnish with a cinnamon stick.

drinks.name: Prince Pum King
ingredients: 4 oz steamed whole milk (or choice milk-base)
drinks.recipe: Steam milk, pumpkin puree and spices together until hot. Double-strain into cup. Stir in Drambuie. Top with additional milk foam and ground nutmeg.

drinks.name: Ancho Reyes Original Hot Chocolate
drinks.recipe: In a saucepan, bring half and half to a simmer (almost boiling). Add chocolate mix and heat, bringing the combined liquids to a simmer. In a coffee cup, pour Ancho Reyes, followed by hot chocolate milk mixture. Garnish with a whole cinnamon stick and an orange peel. *Chocolate mix: Combine 100% cacao powder with turbinado sugar at a 1:3/4 ratio (1 part cacao powder to Â¾ part turbinado sugar). Add hot water lightly while stirring, to reach a thick, rich, liquid consistency. Final ratio should be approximately 1 part cacao powder to Â¾ part turbinado sugar, to Â¾ part water (by volume) Store refrigerated in a sealed container.

drinks.name: Red Wine Spiced Hot Toddy
drinks.recipe: In a sauce pan, lightly simmer wine, the cinnamon sticks, broken, and star anise until warm. Add equal parts sugar and stir until dissolved. Remove from heat and strain. For Hot Toddy: Combine bourbon, lemon juice, and spiced syrup in a mug. Top with hot water and stir. Garnish with a smoke cinnamon stick and lemon wedge.

drinks.name: Docteur du Miel
drinks.recipe: Mix the honey, lemon, simple syrup and cognac. Stir. Add hot water, and cloves, if desired.

drinks.name: Cocoa Buie II
drinks.recipe: In a saucepan combine all ingredients and warm over medium heat. Stir slowly until simmering. Serve hot, garnished with miniature marshmallows if desired.

drinks.name: Irish Coffee
drinks.recipe: Combine all ingredients in a mug or coffee cup. Top with shaken heavy whipping cream and a dusting of nutmeg.

drinks.name: Apple Cardamom Toddy
ingredients: 3 oz cardamom-infused genmaicha green tea (add 1 cardamom pod to steep with the genmaicha tea)
drinks.recipe: Steep tea. Combine all ingredients in a glass or toddy mug and stir. Garnish with cinnamon stick.

drinks.name: Hot Honey Butter
ingredients: 6 oz steamed whole milk (or choice milk-base)
drinks.recipe: Steam milk, apple butter and spices together until hot. Double-strain into cup over butter. Stir in Drambuie. Top with additional milk foam.

drinks.name: Last Stop Darjeeling
drinks.recipe: Make 1/2 pot of black tea and let step. Fill tea mug 3/4 full with hot tea, add remaining cocktail mixture and serve warm with a lemon twist.

drinks.name: Spiced Rum and Hot Chocolate
drinks.recipe: Add equal parts liquor to hot chocolate, top with whipped cream, shaved chocolate, and garnish with a cinnamon stick or candy cane.

drinks.name: Sunshine
drinks.recipe: Shake ingredients well with cracked ice, then strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
